title: Charles Nicod
text: Charles Henri Nicod (28 January 1878, <a href="Levier">Levier</a>, <a href="Doubs">Doubs</a> - December 1967) was a French architect active in the period between the two World Wars. He was the winner of the <a href="Prix%20de%20Rome">Prix de Rome</a> in 1907. His works include the <a href="Majestic%2C%20Cannes">Hotel Majestic</a> in <a href="Cannes">Cannes</a>.
